name: LAYSHA - CHOCOLATE CREAM
author: rdmclin2
readme:
=======================
!!!!!!RULES!!!!!!!
=======================

* You MUST credit "ureshiiiiii" when using this motion. 
(Copy and Paste if you have to.)

* Do NOT claim the motion as your own.

* Do NOT re-distribute the motion under any circumstance.

* Do NOT use for R18+ purposes.

* Do NOT use in VR chat, or any non-MMD program.

* If you put (+Motion DL) in your video title, 
do NOT just link the download, you MUST credit my username.

* You may edit the motion ONLY to make adjustments to "fit" your model.

* Do NOT use the motion with another song.

* Please ASK for persmission before creating new camera data for this motion.

 >>>>The motion download will be terminated if people cannot respect these rules.<<<<

===================================

Your model must have the following bones
for the motion to work correctly:

腰                                    (Waist) 
グルーブ                  (groove)
左足ＩＫ                  (leg IK L)
右足ＩＫ                  (leg IK R)
左つま先ＩＫ        (toe IK L)
右つま先ＩＫ       (toe IK R)
右腕捩            (arm twist_R)
左腕捩            (arm twist_L)
右手捩          (wrist twist_R)
左手捩         ( wrist twist_L)

(Semi-Standard bones)

========================

Password can be found in the video description.

Thanks for downloading,

© ureshiiiiii 2019
